skins.shipDescription: London-class heavy cruiser ¨C Shropshire, Hull Number 73!
skins.selfIntroduction: The youngest of London class, and sent abroad away from my sisters. That is me~ Ah, it's not that I particularly wanted your sympathy, but if you give me a little bit of attention, I'll give you high points for that! ... Acting cute? Oh shush, I was being serious you know~
skins.acquisition: London class' youngest, Shropshire, reporting for duty~ I've been told that I am air-headed and gullible, so I'll be giving you some problems~ Well then, my time awaits~
skins.login: Ah, have you come back, Commander? I was just about to go to your place~
skins.details: You appear to have time, Commander~
skins.secretaryIdle1: I am a little nervous when I am alone with you, Commander, but since you are alone I'm fu... fully calm myself~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Com~man~der~ Help me~ Please, you are the only one I can count on~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Did you know, Commander? Sometimes, making small mistakes can make one seem cuter~
skins.secretaryTouch: If you don't do your work properly, even I will show an angry face for it. Com~man~der?
